page.title: 11Maltby Market
page.content: Maltby market is situated just south of the shops on the High Street.It is held on three days a week,Tuesday, Friday and Saturday.There are 72 stalls on the open market and a small indoor market hall.The traders come from South Yorkshire and Notts,moving their stands from town to town on the different market days.The stalls are mainly for food and clothing.On Friday the market is very busy with people buying in food for the weekend.When we visitied the market it was colourful and bright.It was busy with a bustle of old people and mothers with young children or babies.The narrow aisles were crowded and as I went past the stalls I could smell fish,flowers and hot dogs and hear the buzz of the ice cream freezer.
